name: Alpha Chemika
overview:
We wish to inform you that we are an ISO 9001:2000 Certified Company accredated by UKAS. The Scope of ISO 9001:2000 is : “MANUFACTURER OF LABORATORY CHEMICALS.” Alpha Chemika provides its customers with the highest quality materials at the lowest possible cost. We are confident that you will be pleased with our products and services. Our people are committed to providing support for all products in this catalogue to ensure that every aspect of quotation, order processing, packing & shipment is carried out smoothly & professionally.

Our Team: Procuring agents Production experts Quality controllers Managers Administrative personnel

Our Strengths: With our knowledge and expertise, we understand the requirements of our clients and to deliver the best range of products to our esteem clients. This enables us to successfully cater to various requirements and makes us the ideal choice of the clients.

Infrastructure: We hold a sophisticated infrastructure set-up at Mumbai (Maharashtra, India). To ensure hassle free production process, we have strategically segregated our setup in different units. Manned by proficients, each unit is provided with latest machinery and amenities.

Quality Assurance: We are a quality-oriented organization, henceforth make sure to provide our clients with the best-in-class products. Product-gamut which we have made available is manufactured by making use of supreme quality basic material, procured from reliable vendors of the markets.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we strive to serve them with in the most promising manner. Product-gamut which we have made available is manufactured by making use of supreme quality required basic material. Conforming to the defined parameters of the industry, this range can be availed in both standard and customized forms.
